scripts.build:server: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const entry=fs.existsSync('server/index.ts')?'server/index.ts':(fs.existsSync('src/index.ts')?'src/index.ts':null);if(!entry){console.error('Missing entry: server/index.ts or src/index.ts');process.exit(1)};console.log('Building:',entry)" && npx esbuild $(node -e "const fs=require('fs');process.stdout.write(fs.existsSync('server/index.ts')?'server/index.ts':'src/index.ts')") --bundle --platform=node --format=cjs --outfile=dist/index.cjs --packages=external
